Create a compatible plots filter list object

create_filter_list.Rd

Create a compatible plots filter list from the result of link{show_plots_from}

Usage

create_filter_list(plots_info)

Arguments

plots_info

Object resulted from link{show_plots_from}, or a compatible one (i.e. the same object after some plot filtering).

Value

A list object compatible with the filter_list argument of ffi_to_tibble, fia_to_tibble or ifn_to_tibble

Details

This function takes the result of link{show_plots_from}, or a compatible object and creates a filter list ready to be use with ffi_to_tibble, fia_to_tibble or ifn_to_tibble. Internal heuristics determine the inventory from the data supplied.

Examples

# \donttest{
if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
library(forestables)

# FIA
show_plots_from("FIA", folder = ".", states = "OR") |>
  create_filter_list()
# FFI
show_plots_from("FFI", folder = ".", departments = "21") |>
  create_filter_list()
# IFN
show_plots_from("IFN", folder = ".", provinces = "24", version = "ifn4") |>
  create_filter_list()
} # }
# }
